caption: Figure 1: PS Error ||MN – MPS||2F
description: This figure displays the performative error, which is the Frobenius norm of the difference between the iterate Mn obtained from the RSGD algorithm and the performative stable solution MPS. The results are shown for three different patterns of distributional sensitivity (random, ascending, and descending) under three types of system dynamics (almost surely stable, almost surely unstable, and general). It illustrates the convergence of the RSGD algorithm towards the PSC solution and the impact of system stability and sensitivity patterns on the convergence rate.
